about_the_game:
Pack 1 is the first 2024 content pack and brings 3 brand new pieces of content - the undulating curves and picturesque scenery of Autodromo Internazionale Enzo e Dino Ferrari (Imola Circuit), the striking and beautiful Lamborghini SC63 prototype and the all-new, 2024 evolution Peugeot 9X8 Hypercar.

The Lamborghini SC63 from the stable of the raging bull is a car built with the Italian flair and passion – taking on some of the biggest manufacturers in the world including Toyota, Porsche and Ferrari. It’s 3.8-litre V8 packs a punch, and its exhaust note is one to stir the emotion of any motorsport fan.

Facing the Lamborghini is a car with a special place in the Italian hearts. Imola was chosen by Peugeot to debut the 2024 evolution of its 9X8 Hypercar, with its aggressive and purposeful looks, the fearless lion ran strongly against its regular sparing partners on its debut back in April.

Imola received an enormous crowd back in April, with over 70,000 fans across the three days when the FIA WEC visited in the Spring 2024. Such was its popularity, the undulating circuit nestled in northern Italy will become a permanent feature on future calendars for the next four years – making it a sports car racing fixture for the Tifosi for years to come.

Content included in 2024 Pack 1 - (expected release 23rd July)
• Autodromo Internazionale Enzo e Dino Ferrari (Imola Circuit)
• Lamborghini SC63
• Peugeot 9X8 (2024 spec)

This pack is included in the 2024 Season Pass

name: Le Mans Ultimate - 2024 Pack 1
short_description: The first of four 2024 content packs brings the undulating curves and picturesque scenery of Autodromo Internazionale Enzo e Dino Ferrari (Imola Circuit), the striking and beautiful Lamborghini SC63 prototype and the all-new, 2024 evolution Peugeot 9X8 Hypercar.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
